templates.name: Basic Scope Setup & Waveform
templates.description: Connect to scope, configure channel, capture single acquisition, save waveform to CSV
templates.xml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables></variables>

  <block type="connect_scope" id="c1" x="20" y="20">
    <mutation show_advanced="false" current_backend="pyvisa" current_dev_type="SCOPE" current_conn_type="INSTR" host="192.168.1.100"></mutation>
    <field name="DEVICE_NAME">scope</field>
    <field name="BACKEND">pyvisa</field>
    <next>
      <block type="set_device_context" id="ctx1">
        <mutation device="scope"></mutation>
        <field name="DEVICE">scope</field>
        <next>
          <block type="enable_channel" id="ch1_en">
            <field name="CHANNEL">CH1</field>
            <field name="STATE">ON</field>
            <next>
              <block type="configure_channel" id="ch1_cfg">
                <field name="CHANNEL">CH1</field>
                <field name="SCALE">1.0</field>
                <field name="OFFSET">0.0</field>
                <field name="COUPLING">DC</field>
                <field name="TERMINATION">ONEMEG</field>
                <next>
                  <block type="scpi_write" id="hor_scale">
                    <field name="DEVICE_CONTEXT">(scope)</field>
                    <field name="COMMAND">HORizontal:SCAle 1e-6</field>
                    <next>
                      <block type="acquisition_reset" id="acq_rst">
                        <field name="DEVICE_CONTEXT">(scope)</field>
                        <next>
                          <block type="single_acquisition" id="acq_single">
                            <next>
                              <block type="wait_for_opc" id="opc1">
                                <field name="DEVICE_CONTEXT">(scope)</field>
                                <field name="TIMEOUT">10</field>
                                <next>
                                  <block type="save_waveform" id="save_wf1">
                                    <mutation></mutation>
                                    <field name="DEVICE_CONTEXT">(scope)</field>
                                    <field name="SOURCE">CH1</field>
                                    <field name="FILENAME">ch1.csv</field>
                                    <field name="FORMAT">CSV</field>
                                    <next>
                                      <block type="disconnect" id="d1">
                                        <field name="DEVICE_CONTEXT">(scope)</field>
                                      </block>
                                    </next>
                                  </block>
                                </next>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

templates.name: Hello Scope (Blockly)
templates.description: Simple connect, query IDN, and disconnect using Blockly blocks
templates.xml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables></variables>
  <block type="connect_scope" id="c1" x="20" y="20">
    <mutation show_advanced="false" current_backend="pyvisa" current_dev_type="SCOPE" current_conn_type="INSTR" host="192.168.1.100"></mutation>
    <field name="DEVICE_NAME">scope</field>
    <field name="BACKEND">pyvisa</field>
    <next>
      <block type="scpi_query" id="q1">
        <field name="DEVICE_CONTEXT">(scope)</field>
        <field name="COMMAND">*IDN?</field>
        <field name="VARIABLE">idn</field>
        <next>
          <block type="disconnect" id="d1">
            <field name="DEVICE_CONTEXT">(scope)</field>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>
